the hardware is registered, and we are ready to provide it to a user, the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Manage hardware wizard > Provide/assign hardware \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"wizard in HPAM is used. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Read the detailed description of hardware provision using HPAM is available in Section 3 of the WI \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoint.epam.com/WFT/ITServices/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc=%7b59B814A0-3E85-4111-8509-E41EA367BD28%7d&file=WI_New_Workplace_Creation.docx&action=default\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"New Workplace Creation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hardware usage types\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" While providing hardware in HPAM, it is very important to correctly register a usage type of equipment provided.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Please see the definitions below to clearly understand how equipment is categorized at EPAM, and select a correct usage type within the process of hardware provision.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" All equipment used can be categorized as follows:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Individual\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – hardware is provided to a user for personal use on a permanent or temporary basis. For example, standard employee workstation provision, notebook for a business trip, and so on.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – any hardware that is purchased (for permanent use on the project) or leased from BSS (for temporary use on the project) using the project budget funds for the needs of the project. For example, hardware provision for testing purposes, exceptional hardware provision due to project requirements, and so on.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Public\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – any piece of hardware that is installed in common facilities, subject to the responsibility of the End-User Service, and can be used by anyone. For example, access points, printers, conference room devices, and so on.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Shared\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – hardware that is purchased using the EPAM budget funds, provided for appropriate service cases (such as for Lab, computer classes, and so on), and used by a known group of users. Such hardware is subject to the responsibility of a certain EPAM employee (a Lab Head, tutor, Program Head, and so on).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":263072,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1ccfdaef-1813-4aa8-a2f4-b500e1a39096/13.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1ccfdaef-1813-4aa8-a2f4-b500e1a39096/13.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"13.jpg\",\"name\":\"13.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1ccfdaef-1813-4aa8-a2f4-b500e1a39096\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1023,\"height\":529},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":201362,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9b09b76a-7db6-417a-9816-05aef8ace4bd/New
